DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether AMG 386 AMG 386 Placebo combination Paclitaxel Carboplatin effective treatment ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: TRINOVA-3 : A Study AMG 386 AMG 386 Placebo Combination With Paclitaxel Carboplatin Treat Ovarian Cancer
